summary: This document consists of internal communications regarding AML compliance alerts related to prospective client Jeffrey Epstein. The alerts were reviewed and cleared by compliance officers, indicating that there were no reputational risks associated with onboarding Epstein as a client. The document highlights the distinction between Epstein and another individual with a similar name.

keyFacts: The document discusses AML compliance alerts related to Jeffrey Epstein.
Two PCR alerts were cleared as false positives, distinguishing Epstein from another individual with a similar name.
Chip Packard provided approval for onboarding Epstein based on reputational and legal assessments.
